Posts.Content: MidLifeCrisis wrote: This may seem very strange, but I'm curious to know if anyone else has experienced this. I seem to sweat profusely from my "breasts" (I had skin/nipple sparing BMX in Sep). It only happens when I'm out in the hot sun, thankfully, and not something that I otherwise notice. I've never been one to sweat much and this was never the case pre-surgery so it caught me by surprise. I've got to assume it has something to do with the nerve damage from surgery. I won't see my surgeon again for another month so I figured I'd check here to see if I'm not alone in this very odd effect. Dx 6/11/2014, IDC, Left, Stage IB, Grade 2, 0/2 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: random:excessive sweating from BMX site. Nerve damage the cause? MidLifeCrisis grammakathy
